pkgmetadata.longdescription: Temporal Empirical Dynamic Modeling // Inferring causation from time series data through empirical dynamic modeling (EDM), with methods such as convergent cross mapping from Sugihara et al. (2012) doi:10.1126/science.1227079, partial cross mapping as outlined in Leng et al. (2020) doi:10.1038/s41467-020-16238-0, and cross mapping cardinality as described in Tao et al. (2023) doi:10.1016/j.fmre.2023.01.007.
